EmailTemplate.description: Email template to inform customer to return feedback after onboarding case is closed. CSP-3198
EmailTemplate.name: Onboarding Close Case Email From Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: We’d Love Your Feedback! [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
I am reaching out to gather feedback on your last interaction with your Account Strategist, {!Case.OwnerFullName}. It is important for us to ​collect your feedback to ​be sure that you are getting the best ​customer ​service possible.
If you would take one quick minute and use this link to fill out a quick 2 question survey regarding your recent experience with {!Case.OwnerFullName}, I would greatly appreciate your feedback!
Survey Link: {!Case.SSUserSurveyLink__c}
The Knot Account Strategist Management
